EmailTemplate.description: Used on IEP Bank Account Setup OSCAR Process
EmailTemplate.name: IEP Setup Finalization Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} – IEP Account Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Please be informed that your Account registration for EasyPay is now completed. You can now use the Bank Account you registered to funds your EasyPay wallet(s). Don’t hesitate to contact the IATA Customer Service team for more information.
Thank you,
IATA Customer Service Portal
{!AMS_OSCAR__c.Emails_reference_Id__c}
